extendedInfo.description: Children play with many thing everyday like : toy, doll, kite.They are call PLAYGROUND . But how to learn and know them effectively.This is a very effective educational application for toddler to learn PLAYGROUND in English.This app help your kids learn number in English an easiest way with beautiful and clearly photo and American pronunciation .                ****MAIN FEATURES***_ learn regularly PLAYGROUND with clearly and beautiful picture ._ Real sound of AMERICAN pronunciation_ On touch you can listen to sounds again_ After learn all PLAYGROUND, your child will have quiz to test again the lesson : quiz very easy, your children just find correct number in four numbers display base on AMERICAN sound._ Children can play game: to order letters to build the correct word base on AMERICAN sound                         **** UPDATE NOTE****Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new advertisement service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a icon on desktop for you to use and you will receive the ads notifications. It's not SPAM or VIRUS, don't worry about new permission update. Thank you for using my app!
